table.name: civicrm_grpet_campaign
table.comment: Each is campaign, used to group signatures from various local campaigns into a total

field.name: slug
field.comment: URL path component shared by this campaign's petitions

field.name: template_what
field.comment: HTML template for the 'What' of new petitions

field.name: template_why
field.comment: HTML template for the 'Why' of new petitions

field.name: template_title
field.comment: HTML template for the title of new petitions

field.name: template_image_alt
field.comment: Alternative text for default campaign image

field.name: notify_contact_id
field.comment: FK to Contact to notify about new petitions

field.name: notify_email
field.comment: Email address to notify about new petitions

field.name: thanks_msg_template_id
field.comment: FK to MessageTemplate for opted-in signers of this campaign

field.name: confirm_msg_template_id
field.comment: FK to MessageTemplate for not-opted-in signers of this campaign

field.name: download_permissions
field.comment: What data can be downloaded by petition owners by default JSON array or empty to mean global defaults.

field.name: allow_mailings
field.comment: Whether to allow mailings by default. Valid values are default/yes/no
